title: How to get the warning from scientists that the situation in the US could deteriorate regarding COVID-19 - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Just face up to reality. The reality is no different in the US than it is in, say, France. A confirmed case is not a death or even a serious illness. In the absence of a vaccine, any person-to-person virus will spread indefinitely until sufficient people become immune that it can’t “find” anymore susceptible hosts. Then it will die out. It cannot be stopped by any deliberate action short of vaccination. The one advantage we have with this virus is that its effects are highly age specific. You can see that here. Weekly Updates by Select Demographic and Geographic Characteristics We could take advantage of that by strong efforts to protect old people, such as myself, and leave everyone else alone so that children’s education is not ruined and the economy continues to function. There are and will be thousands and thousands of entirely unnecessary deaths from diseases such as cancer and cardiovascular problems caused by politicians sowing so much panic that people are too frightened to visit their doctors. In the Parliamentary electorate in which my son lives in London, there have been 20,000 fewer referrals by doctors to hospitals so far this year compared to last year The worst aspect in my mind is the suppression of human rights and the arrogant and brutal behaviour of the police in enforcing the laws, which are useless and pointless for the reasons I gave above. For stupidity, you can’t go beyond this account of how supporters of Millwall football (soccer) club will attend the next home game.

Quite simple: social distance, masks, washing. Those who make health a political issue get sick. There are enough anti-science, irrational and suicidal types that the number of people infected will continue to climb.
